1854.58.text: them that I might not make it through the

2643.62.text: minority, you can clap for that, in 2010

2648.38.text: I got my big break, I got a phone call to

2692.27.text: sitting and spinning on a chair on

2698.29.text: not to roll off the screen cause if you've

2700.84.text: ever watched these cable news shows its

2703.55.text: a tight box and its like I'm here, no

2856.46.text: many people on screen have invisble

2865.99.text: powerful that people, even the greatest

2869.54.text: celebrities with the most secured jobs

2879.51.text: issues, Jamie Lynn Sigler was diagnosed

2891.48.text: disability for 10 years. So how do we get

2912.32.text: that we know have disabilities. Why,

2915.78.text: there is three separate reasons: 1. The

2918.53.text: are kids who have had their parents

2928.30.text: Some of them have parents who stifled them

2931.01.text: and made their life one big disability

2938.07.text: to counseling sessions, going to their

2941.22.text: school and making a big deal, and they

2945.21.text: come here and do not know how to advocate

2961.49.text: something. When people ask for help, they

2964.59.text: do not want to. When I became a guest

2967.64.text: comedian at Arizona State University, I

2970.54.text: made my triumphant return 20 years after

2973.60.text: they danced real slow in Jackson, and I

2976.98.text: was sitting in the club,fancy schmancy
